about.title: About BiblioFuse
about.intro_1: BiblioFuse is a suite of tools and readers designed to give e-book lovers complete control over their library. Unlike walled gardens that lock you into a specific ecosystem, BiblioFuse empowers you to manage, convert, and read your books on any device.
about.intro_2: Our web tool uses cutting-edge WebAssembly (WASM) technology to process files entirely on your device. This means private, fast, and secure file management without ever uploading your personal library to a server.
about.work_text: We are a small, passionate team dedicated to building software that respects user privacy and ownership. We are currently open to freelance opportunities and collaborations.
about.connect_text: Interested in contributing or hiring? Reach out to us.

home.title: Manage & Read E-Books Anywhere
home.desc: BiblioFuse is the ultimate e-book ecosystem. Merge CBZ/EPUB files, manage your library privately with WASM, and read on any device with our next-gen readers.

reader.title: Next-Gen E-Book Reader
reader.desc: A fast, distraction-free e-book reader for iOS and Android. Features continuous webtoon mode, smart tagging, and Peek Zoom for comics.

about.title: About Us
about.desc: Learn about the team behind BiblioFuse. We are dedicated to building private, user-first software for e-book lovers.
